short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linguagem is a chrome extension that allows you to learn languages with your favorite streaming services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linguagem is a chrome extension that allows you to learn languages with netflix. For now it works only on netflix, but in the future it will work with any video streaming service that contains subtitles in it. It highlights on the words you don't know and you have to manually unhighlight them through an app on your phone.
